text: David William "Dai" Dower MBE (20 June 1933 â€“ 1 August 2016), was a British, Empire and European Flyweight boxing champion. He was one of the most successful Welsh boxers of all time. Dower also competed for Britain at the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==Other websites== * Fight record * British Boxing Web Site * * Dai Dower on Pascual Perez world title fight BBC Sport Category:1933 births Category:2016 deaths Category:British boxers Category:Welsh sportspeople Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:1952 Summer Olympics
title: Dai Dower
